titleStmt.title: The shepherds hunting being, certaine eglogs written during the time of the authors imprisonment in the Marshalsey. By George VVither, gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Snodham for George Norton, and are to be sold at the signe of the red-Bull, neere Temple-barre,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The shepheards hunting.
In this edition, preface signed: Geo. Wyther.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the red-Bull, neere Temple-barre
